<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>OMS Product Roadmap - Thai Watsadu</title>
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=DM+Sans:wght@400;500;700&family=Space+Mono:wght@400;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    <style>
        :root {
            --bg-dark: #0a0a0f;
            --bg-card: #12121a;
            --bg-hover: #1a1a25;
            --accent-cyan: #00d4ff;
            --accent-purple: #a855f7;
            --accent-pink: #ec4899;
            --accent-orange: #f97316;
            --accent-green: #22c55e;
            --accent-yellow: #eab308;
            --accent-blue: #3b82f6;
            --accent-red: #ef4444;
            --accent-teal: #14b8a6;
            --text-primary: #f8fafc;
            --text-secondary: #94a3b8;
            --text-muted: #64748b;
            --border: #1e293b;
        }

        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }

        body {
            font-family: 'DM Sans', sans-serif;
            background: var(--bg-dark);
            color: var(--text-primary);
            min-height: 100vh;
            overflow-x: auto;
        }

        .noise-overlay {
            position: fixed;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            pointer-events: none;
            opacity: 0.03;
            background-image: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg viewBox='0 0 400 400' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cfilter id='noiseFilter'%3E%3CfeTurbulence type='fractalNoise' baseFrequency='0.9' numOctaves='4' stitchTiles='stitch'/%3E%3C/filter%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' filter='url(%23noiseFilter)'/%3E%3C/svg%3E");
            z-index: 1000;
        }

        .gradient-bg {
            position: fixed;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            background: 
                radial-gradient(ellipse 80% 50% at 20% 40%, rgba(168, 85, 247, 0.15) 0%, transparent 50%),
                radial-gradient(ellipse 60% 40% at 80% 20%, rgba(0, 212, 255, 0.1) 0%, transparent 50%),
                radial-gradient(ellipse 50% 60% at 60% 80%, rgba(236, 72, 153, 0.08) 0%, transparent 50%);
            pointer-events: none;
        }

        .container {
            position: relative;
            max-width: 100%;
            padding: 2rem;
            z-index: 1;
        }

        header {
            text-align: center;
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
            animation: fadeInDown 0.8s ease-out;
        }

        @keyframes fadeInDown {
            from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(-30px); }
            to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); }
        }

        .logo-badge {
            display: inline-flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 0.5rem;
            padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
            background: rgba(0, 212, 255, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid rgba(0, 212, 255, 0.3);
            border-radius: 100px;
            font-family: 'Space Mono', monospace;
            font-size: 0.75rem;
            color: var(--accent-cyan);
            letter-spacing: 0.1em;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
        }

        .logo-badge::before {
            content: '';
            width: 8px;
            height: 8px;
            background: var(--accent-cyan);
            border-radius: 50%;
            animation: pulse 2s infinite;
        }

        @keyframes pulse {
            0%, 100% { opacity: 1; transform: scale(1); }
            50% { opacity: 0.5; transform: scale(1.2); }
        }

        h1 {
            font-size: clamp(2rem, 5vw, 3.5rem);
            font-weight: 700;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--text-primary) 0%, var(--accent-cyan) 50%, var(--accent-purple) 100%);
            -webkit-background-clip: text;
            -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
            background-clip: text;
            margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
            letter-spacing: -0.02em;
        }

        .subtitle {
            font-size: 1.1rem;
            color: var(--text-secondary);
            font-weight: 400;
        }

        .drag-hint {
            display: inline-flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 0.5rem;
            margin-top: 0.75rem;
            padding: 0.4rem 0.8rem;
            background: rgba(34, 197, 94, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid rgba(34, 197, 94, 0.3);
            border-radius: 6px;
            font-size: 0.75rem;
            color: var(--accent-green);
        }

        .phase-tabs {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            gap: 1rem;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
        }

        .phase-tab {
            padding: 0.6rem 1.2rem;
            background: var(--bg-card);
            border: 1px solid var(--border);
            border-radius: 8px;
            font-size: 0.85rem;
            color: var(--text-secondary);
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }

        .phase-tab:hover {
            border-color: var(--accent-cyan);
            color: var(--text-primary);
        }

        .phase-tab.active {
            background: rgba(0, 212, 255, 0.15);
            border-color: var(--accent-cyan);
            color: var(--accent-cyan);
        }

        .phase-badge {
            display: inline-block;
            padding: 0.2rem 0.5rem;
            border-radius: 4px;
            font-size: 0.65rem;
            margin-left: 0.5rem;
            font-weight: 600;
        }

        .phase-badge.cfr-ds {
            background: rgba(168, 85, 247, 0.2);
            color: var(--accent-purple);
        }

        .phase-badge.ds-only {
            background: rgba(249, 115, 22, 0.2);
            color: var(--accent-orange);
        }

        .legend {
            display: flex;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            justify-content: center;
            gap: 0.75rem;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
            animation: fadeIn 1s ease-out 0.3s both;
        }

        @keyframes fadeIn {
            from { opacity: 0; }
            to { opacity: 1; }
        }

        .legend-item {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 0.5rem;
            padding: 0.4rem 0.8rem;
            background: var(--bg-card);
            border-radius: 6px;
            font-size: 0.75rem;
            color: var(--text-secondary);
            border: 1px solid var(--border);
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }

        .legend-item:hover {
            border-color: var(--accent-cyan);
            transform: translateY(-2px);
        }

        .legend-dot {
            width: 10px;
            height: 10px;
            border-radius: 3px;
        }

        .stats-bar {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            gap: 1.5rem;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            animation: fadeIn 1s ease-out 0.5s both;
        }

        .stat-item {
            text-align: center;
            padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
            background: var(--bg-card);
            border: 1px solid var(--border);
            border-radius: 10px;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }

        .stat-item:hover {
            border-color: var(--accent-cyan);
            transform: translateY(-2px);
        }

        .stat-value {
            font-family: 'Space Mono', monospace;
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            font-weight: 700;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--accent-cyan), var(--accent-purple));
            -webkit-background-clip: text;
            -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
            background-clip: text;
        }

        .stat-label {
            font-size: 0.7rem;
            color: var(--text-muted);
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.05em;
            margin-top: 0.15rem;
        }

        .roadmap-wrapper {
            overflow-x: auto;
            overflow-y: visible;
            padding-bottom: 2rem;
            position: relative;
        }

        .roadmap {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 180px repeat(10, minmax(200px, 1fr));
            grid-auto-flow: row;
            grid-auto-rows: minmax(min-content, auto);
            gap: 0;
            min-width: 2400px;
            align-items: stretch;
        }

        .header-cell {
            padding: 0.75rem;
            text-align: center;
            border-bottom: 2px solid var(--border);
            animation: fadeInDown 0.5s ease-out both;
            background: var(--bg-dark);
            position: sticky;
            top: 0;
            z-index: 100;
        }

        .sprint-label {
            font-family: 'Space Mono', monospace;
            font-size: 0.8rem;
            font-weight: 700;
            color: var(--text-primary);
            padding: 0.4rem 0.8rem;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(0, 212, 255, 0.2) 0%, rgba(168, 85, 247, 0.2) 100%);
            border-radius: 6px;
            display: inline-block;
        }

        .sprint-label.backlog {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(100, 116, 139, 0.3) 0%, rgba(71, 85, 105, 0.3) 100%);
            color: var(--text-muted);
        }

        .category-label {
            padding: 0.75rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            font-size: 0.8rem;
            color: var(--text-primary);
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 0.5rem;
            border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border);
            position: sticky;
            left: 0;
            background: var(--bg-dark);
            z-index: 90;
            grid-column: 1;
        }

        .category-icon {
            width: 28px;
            height: 28px;
            border-radius: 6px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
        }

        .sprint-cell {
            padding: 0.4rem;
            border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border);
            border-left: 1px solid rgba(30, 41, 59, 0.5);
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: 0.3rem;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            overflow: visible;
        }

        .sprint-cell.drag-over-valid {
            background: rgba(34, 197, 94, 0.15);
            border: 2px dashed var(--accent-green);
            border-radius: 6px;
        }

        .feature-card {
            padding: 0.5rem 0.6rem;
            border-radius: 6px;
            font-size: 0.7rem;
            font-weight: 500;
            cursor: grab;
            transition: all 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
            animation: slideIn 0.5s ease-out both;
            user-select: none;
            line-height: 1.3;
            flex-shrink: 0;
            width: 100%;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }

        .feature-card:active { cursor: grabbing; }

        .feature-card.dragging {
            opacity: 0.5;
            transform: scale(0.95);
        }

        @keyframes slideIn {
            from { opacity: 0; transform: translateX(-20px); }
            to { opacity: 1; transform: translateX(0); }
        }

        .feature-card::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 3px;
            height: 100%;
            border-radius: 3px 0 0 3px;
        }

        .feature-card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-2px) scale(1.02);
            box-shadow: 0 8px 20px -8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
        }

        .feature-card .drag-handle {
            position: absolute;
            right: 4px;
            top: 50%;
            transform: translateY(-50%);
            opacity: 0;
            transition: opacity 0.2s ease;
            color: inherit;
            font-size: 0.6rem;
        }

        .feature-card:hover .drag-handle { opacity: 0.5; }

        .feature-card .assignee {
            display: block;
            font-size: 0.6rem;
            opacity: 0.7;
            margin-top: 0.2rem;
        }

        .feature-card .detail-hint {
            display: none;
            font-size: 0.55rem;
            opacity: 0.6;
            margin-top: 0.15rem;
            font-style: italic;
        }

        /* Category colors */
        .cat-order {
            background: rgba(0, 212, 255, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid rgba(0, 212, 255, 0.3);
            color: #7dd3fc;
        }
        .cat-order::before { background: var(--accent-cyan); }
        .cat-order:hover { background: rgba(0, 212, 255, 0.2); border-color: var(--accent-cyan); }

        .cat-validation {
            background: rgba(168, 85, 247, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid rgba(168, 85, 247, 0.3);
            color: #c4b5fd;
        }
        .cat-validation::before { background: var(--accent-purple); }
        .cat-validation:hover { background: rgba(168, 85, 247, 0.2); border-color: var(--accent-purple); }

        .cat-inventory {
            background: rgba(34, 197, 94, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid rgba(34, 197, 94, 0.3);
            color: #86efac;
        }
        .cat-inventory::before { background: var(--accent-green); }
        .cat-inventory:hover { background: rgba(34, 197, 94, 0.2); border-color: var(--accent-green); }

        .cat-payment {
            background: rgba(249, 115, 22, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid rgba(249, 115, 22, 0.3);
            color: #fdba74;
        }
        .cat-payment::before { background: var(--accent-orange); }
        .cat-payment:hover { background: rgba(249, 115, 22, 0.2); border-color: var(--accent-orange); }

        .cat-orchestration {
            background: rgba(236, 72, 153, 0.1);

        }
        .cat-orchestration::before { background: var(--accent-pink); }

content.text:
I've completed the styling update for the Vue 3 roadmap app to match the original product-roadmap.html design. Here's a summary of all the changes made:

## Summary of Changes

### 1. `src/style.css`
- Added Google Fonts import for DM Sans and Space Mono
- Added CSS custom properties for dark theme colors (--bg-dark, --bg-card, --accent-cyan, etc.)
- Added noise overlay and gradient background styles
- Added glassmorphism button and card styles
- Added category color classes (cat-order, cat-validation, etc.) with proper hover effects
- Added feature card styles with accent border bars
- Added sprint cell, header cell, and category label styles
- Added modal and form input styles
- Added toast notification styles
- Added custom scrollbar styling
- Added keyframe animations (fadeInDown, fadeIn, slideIn, pulse)

### 2. `index.html`
- Added gradient background div
- Added noise overlay div
- Updated page title

### 3. `App.vue`
- Updated to dark theme with gradient title
- Added logo badge with pulsing dot
- Updated header styling with animations

### 4. `ControlPanel.vue`
- Converted to dark theme with glassmorphism
- Added colored accent buttons (cyan, green, purple, orange)
- Added sticky positioning with backdrop blur

### 5. `RoadmapGrid.vue`
- Updated to dark grid layout
- Added sprint labels with gradient backgrounds
- Sticky headers with proper z-indexing

### 6. `SprintCell.vue`
- Dark theme with border styling
- Green dashed border on drag-over
- Cyan dashed "New Feature" button

### 7. `FeatureCard.vue`
- Updated to use category color classes
- Added colored accent bars on left side
- Delete button shows on hover
- Slide-in animation

### 8. `CategoryRow.vue`
- Dark sticky category labels
- Icon backgrounds with category colors
- Hover delete button

### 9. Modal Components (CategoryModal, SprintModal, FeatureModal)
- Dark modal backdrop with blur
- Card background with border
- Colored title (cyan, purple, green)
- Dark form inputs with accent focus colors
- Styled buttons

### 10. `ToastContainer.vue`
- Centered bottom positioning
- Dark background with colored borders based on type
- Smooth slide-up animations

You can now run `npm run dev` to see the updated dark theme styling matching the original design.
